author: samwilsn
content:
Are people allowed to edit two EIPs in one PR?

https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/5299

author: abcoathup
content:
Label is `updateEIP` when it should be `newEIPFile`. 
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/5313

author: abcoathup
content:
Mixing a new EIP and an existing EIP is confusing.  
I assume this was done in error as they don't share authors, so you shouldn't do this.
